result.html: Cad chuige nár tháinig túWhy did you not come?
result.ponchtml: Cad ċuige nár ṫáinig túWhy did you not come?

result.eng: This one of the people who didn't pay the fee.
result.ga: Seo duine de na daoine nár íoc an táille
result.orig: Seo duine de na daoine nár íoc an táille
result.html: Seo duine de na daoine nár íoc an táilleThis one of the people who didn't pay the fee.
result.ponchtml: Seo duine de na daoine nár íoc an táilleThis one of the people who didn't pay the fee.

result.eng: Why didn't you pay the fee?
result.ga: Tuige nár íoc tú an táille
result.orig: Tuige nár íoc tú an táille
result.html: Tuige nár íoc tú an táilleWhy didn't you pay the fee?
result.ponchtml: Tuige nár íoc tú an táilleWhy didn't you pay the fee?

result.eng: I hope you didn't steal all the money.
result.ga: Tá súil agam nár ghoid tú an t-airgead sin go léir
result.orig: Tá súil agam nár ghoid tú an t-airgead sin go léir
result.html: Tá súil agam nár ghoid tú an t-airgead sin go léirI hope you didn't steal all the money.
result.ponchtml: Tá súil agam nár ġoid tú an t-airgead sin go léirI hope you didn't steal all the money.

result.eng: It was a miracle that nobody was injured.
result.ga: Ba mhíorúilt é nár goineadh aon duine
result.orig: Ba mhíorúilt é nár goineadh aon duine
result.html: Ba mhíorúilt é nár goineadh aon duineIt was a miracle that nobody was injured.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁíorúilt é nár goineaḋ aon duineIt was a miracle that nobody was injured.

result.eng: He almost collapsed from the view he was getting.
result.ga: Ba bheag nár thit sé as a sheasamh leis an radharc a bhí os a chomhair
result.orig: Ba bheag nár thit sé as a sheasamh leis an radharc a bhí os a chomhair
result.html: Ba bheag nár thit sé as a sheasamh leis an radharc a bhí os a chomhairHe almost collapsed from the view he was getting.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḃeag nár ṫit sé as a ẛeasaṁ leis an raḋarc a ḃí os a ċoṁairHe almost collapsed from the view he was getting.

result.eng: Although we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.
result.ga: Cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeas
result.orig: Cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeas
result.html: Cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeasAlthough we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.
result.ponchtml: Cé nár ṫiteamar amaċ le ċéile ar fad ṫáinig fuaċt ar an gcairdeasAlthough we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.

result.eng: She thought punctuality didn't suit the American Indian perspective on life.
result.ga: Shíl sí nár thit poncúlacht isteach le dearcadh saoil na Meiriceánach Dúchasach
result.orig: Shíl sí nár thit poncúlacht isteach le dearcadh saoil na Meiriceánach Dúchasach
result.html: Shíl sí nár thit poncúlacht isteach le dearcadh saoil na Meiriceánach DúchasachShe thought punctuality didn't suit the American Indian perspective on life.
result.ponchtml: Ṡíl sí nár ṫit poncúlaċt isteaċ le dearcaḋ saoil na Meiriceánaċ DúċasaċShe thought punctuality didn't suit the American Indian perspective on life.

result.eng: And in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?
result.ga: Agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháin
result.orig: Agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháin
result.html: Agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháinAnd in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?
result.ponchtml: Agus le cois sin dá mba ḃuama é cén fáṫ nár pléascaḋ gaċ taoḃ seaċas an dá ṫaoḃ aṁáinAnd in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?

result.eng: Indeed, there are still some unanswered questions, expecially those about building seven.
result.ga: Go deimhin tá ceisteanna go leor nár freagraíodh go fóill go háirithe na cinn faoi fhoirgneamh a seacht
result.orig: Go deimhin tá ceisteanna go leor nár freagraíodh go fóill go háirithe na cinn faoi fhoirgneamh a seacht
result.html: Go deimhin tá ceisteanna go leor nár freagraíodh go fóill go háirithe na cinn faoi fhoirgneamh a seachtIndeed, there are still some unanswered questions, expecially those about building seven.
result.ponchtml: Go deiṁin tá ceisteanna go leor nár freagraíoḋ go fóill go háiriṫe na cinn faoi ḟoirgneaṁ a seaċtIndeed, there are still some unanswered questions, expecially those about building seven.

result.eng: As the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ga: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.orig: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.html: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíochtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ponchtml: Mar a leaṫ an tír siar amaċ ṫáinig níos mó stáit isteaċ san aontaċt nár ġlac le scláḃaíoċtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.

result.eng: In 1856 the United States Supreme Court ruled that the country's bill of rights did not apply to Black people.
result.ga: In 1856 rialaigh Cúirt Uachtarach na Stát Aontaithe nár bhain bille cearta na tíre le daoine Gorma
result.orig: In 1856 rialaigh Cúirt Uachtarach na Stát Aontaithe nár bhain bille cearta na tíre le daoine Gorma
result.html: In 1856 rialaigh Cúirt Uachtarach na Stát Aontaithe nár bhain bille cearta na tíre le daoine GormaIn 1856 the United States Supreme Court ruled that the country's bill of rights did not apply to Black people.
result.ponchtml: In 1856 rialaiġ Cúirt Uaċtaraċ na Stát Aontaiṫe nár ḃain bille cearta na tíre le daoine GormaIn 1856 the United States Supreme Court ruled that the country's bill of rights did not apply to Black people.

result.eng: Not that I wouldn't like to drink to your health but...
result.ga: Chan díth nár mhaith liom bhur sláinte a ól ach
result.orig: Chan díth nár mhaith liom bhur sláinte a ól ach
result.html: Chan díth nár mhaith liom bhur sláinte a ól achNot that I wouldn't like to drink to your health but...
result.ponchtml: Ċan díṫ nár ṁaiṫ liom ḃur sláinte a ól aċNot that I wouldn't like to drink to your health but...

result.eng: It's easy for you to stop drinking when you haven't started.
result.ga: Is furast duitse stad den ól nuair nár thúsaigh tú air
result.orig: Is furast duitse stad den ól nuair nár thúsaigh tú air
result.html: Is furast duitse stad den ól nuair nár thúsaigh tú airIt's easy for you to stop drinking when you haven't started.
result.ponchtml: Is furast duitse stad den ól nuair nár ṫúsaiġ tú airIt's easy for you to stop drinking when you haven't started.

result.eng: If only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
result.ga: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith mé
result.orig: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith mé
result.html: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith méIf only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
result.ponchtml: Mo ċreaċ agus mo ċrá gan mé ċoṁ hóg leatsa inniu Ċaiṫfinn saol nár ċaiṫ méIf only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
